mapper.select: SELECT seat_address AS seatAddress FROM meetingfilm_field_t f, meetingfilm_hall_dict_t d WHERE f.hall_id = d.UUID and f.UUID = #{fieldId}

SELECT o.UUID as orderId, h.film_name as filmName, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(o.order_time,'%m月%d日'),' ',f.begin_time) as fieldTime, c.cinema_name as cinemaName, o.seats_name as seatName, o.order_price as orderPrice, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(o.order_time) as orderTimestamp FROM meetingfilm_order_2017_t o, meetingfilm_field_t f, meetingfilm_hall_film_info_t h, meetingfilm_cinema_t c WHERE o.cinema_id = c.UUID AND o.field_id = f.UUID AND o.film_id = h.film_id AND o.UUID = #{orderId}

SELECT o.UUID as orderId, h.film_name as filmName, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(o.order_time,'%y年%m月%d日'),' ',f.begin_time) as fieldTime, c.cinema_name as cinemaName, o.seats_name as seatName, o.order_price as orderPrice, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(o.order_time) as orderTimestamp FROM meetingfilm_order_2017_t o, meetingfilm_field_t f, meetingfilm_hall_film_info_t h, meetingfilm_cinema_t c WHERE o.cinema_id = c.UUID AND o.field_id = f.UUID AND o.film_id = h.film_id AND o.order_user = #{userId}
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(seats_ids) FROM meetingfilm_order_2017_t WHERE field_id = #{fieldId}
